# OpenToolBox project context for LLMs

title: OpenToolBox
description: A comprehensive collection of free, open-source, and secure developer tools.
url: https://tools.voidcraftr.com

# Core Features
- 100% Client-side processing for privacy
- Developer Tools: JSON Formatter, SQL Formatter, JWT Decoder, UUID Generator
- Design Tools: Image Converter, Box Shadow Generator, Gradient Generator
- Security Tools: Password Generator
- General Tools: QR Code Generator, Unit Converter

# Tech Stack
- Framework: Next.js 15 (App Router)
- Language: TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Components: Shadcn/UI
- Icons: Lucide React

# Purpose
To provide a fast, secure, and beautiful alternative to ad-heavy tool sites. 
We prioritize user experience and privacy above all.
